arts.ttl: Manchester United achieve unwanted club first in Premier League despite Leicester victory
arts.sum: Manchester United achieve an unwanted club first in the Premier League despite easing to a 3-0 win over Leicester City in Ruud van Nistelrooy's final match in charge.

arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes falls just short of Cristiano Ronaldo Man United milestone in Leicester victory
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes falls just short of matching a Manchester United record set by Cristiano Ronaldo with his man-of-the-match showing against Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Ruud Van Nistelrooy opens up on his Man United future after interim spell in charge comes to an end with dominant win against Leicester
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT AT OLD TRAFFORD: Ruud Van Nistelrooy rounded off his four-game spell in charge with a 3-0 win over Leicester, taking him to three wins and a draw since taking on the role.

arts.ttl: Leicester didn't show 'desire to defend goal' against Man Utd - Cooper
arts.sum: Leicester City boss Steve Cooper says his side were lacking in both defence and attack after a 3-0 loss at Manchester United in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes reveals why Alejandro Garnacho did NOT celebrate after scoring in win over Leicester - as Man United captain hails the Argentine as a 'special player'
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT AT OLD TRAFFORD:It has been an up-and-down campaign so far for Garnacho having missed a series of big chances in the Premier League and he lost his place to Marcus Rashford.

arts.ttl: Two Man Utd stars give Ruben Amorim blueprint for the future in Leicester demolition
arts.sum: MAN UTD 3-0 LEICESTER CITY: Ruud van Nistelrooy's spell as caretaker manager at Old Trafford ended with a flourish, handing Ruben Amorim a team full of confidence

arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes reaches huge Premier League milestone during Leicester victory
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes achieved an impressive milestone during Manchester United's 3-0 win over Leicester City on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Man United Bruno Fernandes makes Alejandro Garnacho claim after forward's low-key celebration vs. Leicester
arts.sum: Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes explains Alejandro Garnacho's low-key celebration after scoring against Leicester City on Sunday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes receives a framed shirt from Sir Jim Ratcliffe to mark Man United landmark - before opening the scoring against Leicester
arts.sum: The Portuguese midfielder has been one of United's most important players since joining from Sporting in 2020, a period in which consistently reliable figures have been few and far between.

arts.ttl: Utd thrash Leicester as Amorim era set to begin
arts.sum: Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes bagged one goal and created two more in his team's spirited 3-0 Premier League victory over Leicester City on Sunday.
